name: Flowerless Gardenia 白花未咲
detailed_description:
Story


The two hands that are tightly held are gradually cold,
The white flower finally bloomed at this moment.
Still, I still met you,
The fragmented world has become beautiful.
If you can feel this happiness,
Even if the heartbeat stops,
Even if it is highly toxic,
Can not hinder this oath.
Breathing is weak,
Bright red gradually spread,
Let the rain wash away all my lies,
Then, say goodbye to this ugly world.

Features


The game's gameplay is close to AVG. It is based on the plot with a single ending. What's more is a collection system. According to the complete collection of items, the ending will be unlocked after the day. If the player completes all collections, the game will have a hidden plot at the end of the story.

Other


This story is containing Yuri-love.
